footer.slogan: Your go-to suite of online tools for PDF and image management.
footer.subscribe_text: Get the latest news, articles, and resources, sent to your inbox weekly.
footer.copyright: © {year} I Love PDFLY. All Rights Reserved.

homepage.hero_title: Every tool you need to work with PDFs in one place
homepage.hero_subtitle: Every tool you need to use PDFs, at your fingertips. All are 100% FREE and easy to use! Merge, split, compress, convert, rotate, unlock and watermark PDFs with just a few clicks.
homepage.solutions_subtitle: PDF tools tailored to your specific needs.
homepage.simple_steps_subtitle: Get your PDF tasks done in just a few clicks.
homepage.why_choose_subtitle: The ultimate online toolkit for all your PDF needs.
homepage.blog_subtitle: Tips, tricks, and updates from our team to help you be more productive.
homepage.premium_subtitle: Complete projects faster with batch file processing, convert scanned documents with OCR and e-sign your business agreements.

merge-pdf.title: Merge PDF
merge-pdf.description: Combine PDFs in the order you want with the easiest PDF merger available.

split-pdf.title: Split PDF
split-pdf.description: Separate one page or a whole set for easy conversion into independent PDF files.

organize-pdf.title: Organize PDF
organize-pdf.description: Sort, add, and remove PDF pages. Arrange your document pages as you wish.

rotate-pdf.title: Rotate PDF
rotate-pdf.description: Rotate your PDFs the way you need them. You can even rotate multiple PDFs at once!

zip-maker.title: Create ZIP file
zip-maker.description: Easily create a ZIP archive from multiple files or an entire folder.

compress-pdf.title: Compress PDF
compress-pdf.description: Reduce file size while optimizing for maximal PDF quality.

repair-pdf.title: Repair PDF file
repair-pdf.description: Upload a corrupt PDF and we will try to fix it. Depending on how much the PDF is damaged we will be able to recover it partially or completely.
repair-pdf.infoText: We will try to repair your PDFs. You can get a different file format on download if we detect that format in your file.

resize-file.title: Resize File
resize-file.description: Change the file size of images or PDFs by adjusting quality and compression.

jpg-to-pdf.title: JPG to PDF
jpg-to-pdf.description: Convert JPG images to PDF in seconds. Easily adjust orientation and margins.

psd-to-pdf.title: PSD to PDF
psd-to-pdf.description: Convert Adobe Photoshop files (PSD) to PDF documents easily.

word-to-pdf.title: Word to PDF
word-to-pdf.description: Convert your WORD documents to PDF with the best quality and conversion.

powerpoint-to-pdf.title: Convert POWERPOINT to PDF
powerpoint-to-pdf.description: Make PPT and PPTX slideshows easy to view by converting them to PDF.

excel-to-pdf.title: Excel to PDF
excel-to-pdf.description: Convert your EXCEL spreadsheets to PDF. XLS and XLSX to PDF converter.

html-to-pdf.title: HTML to PDF
html-to-pdf.description: Convert webpages in HTML to PDF. Copy and paste the URL of the page you want and convert it to PDF with a click.

scan-to-pdf.title: Scan to PDF
scan-to-pdf.description: Turn your phone into a document scanner. Capture, edit, and correct the perspective of your documents to create high-quality scans.

pdf-to-jpg.title: PDF to JPG
pdf-to-jpg.description: Extract images from your PDF or convert each page into a JPG.

pdf-to-png.title: PDF to PNG
pdf-to-png.description: Convert each PDF page into a high-quality PNG image.

pdf-to-word.title: PDF to Word
pdf-to-word.description: Easily convert your PDF files into easy to edit DOC and DOCX documents.

pdf-to-powerpoint.title: PDF to PowerPoint
pdf-to-powerpoint.description: Turn your PDF files into easy to edit PPT and PPTX slideshows.

pdf-to-excel.title: PDF to Excel
pdf-to-excel.description: Pull data straight from PDFs into Excel spreadsheets in a few clicks.

pdf-to-pdfa.title: PDF to PDF/A
pdf-to-pdfa.description: Transform your PDF to PDF/A, the ISO-standardized version for long-term archiving.

extract-text.title: Extract text
extract-text.description: Extract all text from a PDF file to a TXT file.

edit-pdf.title: Edit PDF
edit-pdf.description: Add text, images, shapes or freehand annotations to a PDF document.

page-numbers.title: Page numbers
page-numbers.description: Add page numbers into PDFs with ease. Choose your positions, dimensions, typography.

crop-pdf.title: Crop PDF
crop-pdf.description: Crop margins of PDF files to change the page size or remove unwanted areas.

ocr-pdf.title: OCR PDF
ocr-pdf.description: Easily convert scanned PDF into searchable and selectable documents.

compare-pdf.title: Compare PDF
compare-pdf.description: Show a side-by-side comparison of two PDF files to spot the differences.

redact-pdf.title: Redact PDF
redact-pdf.description: Redact text and graphics from your PDF to permanently remove sensitive information.

ai-question-generator.title: AI Question Generator
ai-question-generator.description: Automatically create questions from any text using AI. Perfect for study guides and quizzes.

invoice-generator.title: Invoice Generator
invoice-generator.description: Create professional invoices for free. Customize with your logo, add items, and download as PDF.

cv-generator.title: CV Generator
cv-generator.description: Create a professional CV by providing your details. Choose from multiple templates and download as a PDF.

lesson-plan-creator.title: Lesson Plan Creator
lesson-plan-creator.description: Create detailed, engaging lesson plans for any subject in seconds. Let AI build a plan with activities, assessments, and homework.

unlock-pdf.title: Unlock PDF
unlock-pdf.description: Remove PDF password security, giving you the freedom to use your PDFs as you want.

protect-pdf.title: Protect PDF
protect-pdf.description: Protect PDF files with a password. Encrypt PDF documents to prevent unauthorized access.

sign-pdf.title: Sign PDF
sign-pdf.description: Sign yourself or request electronic signatures from others.

watermark-pdf.title: Watermark
watermark-pdf.description: Stamp an image or text over your PDF in seconds. Choose the typography, transparency and position.

resize-image.title: Resize image
resize-image.description: Define your dimensions, by percentage or pixel, and resize your JPG, PNG, and GIF images.

remove-background.title: Remove Background
remove-background.description: Automatically remove the background from any image with a single click.

crop-image.title: Crop image
crop-image.description: Crop JPG, PNG, or GIFs with ease.

convert-to-jpg.title: Convert to JPG
convert-to-jpg.description: Convert PNG, GIF, TIF, PSD, SVG, WEBP or RAW to JPG.

convert-from-jpg.title: Convert from JPG
convert-from-jpg.description: Convert from JPG to PNG or GIF.

compress-image.title: Compress Image
compress-image.description: Reduce file size while optimizing for maximal image quality.

watermark-image.title: Watermark Image
watermark-image.description: Stamp an image or text over your images in seconds.
